home.title: AI-Powered Digital Lending Platform
home.subtitle: Connecting borrowers with the right lenders across 12 loan sectors. Experience instant approvals, competitive rates, and seamless digital processes.
home.loan_sectors_desc: From personal needs to business growth, we cover every financial requirement with tailored solutions and competitive rates.
home.why_choose_desc: Leveraging cutting-edge technology and deep market insights to revolutionize lending in India.
home.ready_to_start_desc: Join millions of satisfied customers who trust Fin-Agentix for their financial needs. Apply now and get instant approval!

personal.name: Personal Loan
personal.description: Flexible personal loans for all your individual needs with competitive interest rates and quick disbursal.

home.name: Home Loan
home.description: Affordable home loans to make your dream of owning a house a reality with flexible repayment options.

vehicle.name: Vehicle Loan
vehicle.description: Finance your dream car, bike, or commercial vehicle with our competitive vehicle loan schemes.

business.name: Business Loan
business.description: Fuel your business growth with our tailored business loan solutions for entrepreneurs and enterprises.

education.name: Education Loan
education.description: Invest in your future with our comprehensive education loan programs for domestic and international studies.

gold.name: Gold Loan
gold.description: Quick and easy gold loans with minimal documentation and competitive rates on your precious metals.

agriculture.name: Agriculture Loan
agriculture.description: Specialized agricultural financing for farmers and agri-businesses to support crop cultivation and farming equipment.

microfinance.name: Microfinance
microfinance.description: Small ticket loans for micro-enterprises, self-help groups, and women entrepreneurs with flexible terms.

credit-card.name: Credit Card
credit-card.description: Premium credit cards with reward points, cashback offers, and exclusive benefits for all your spending needs.

two-wheeler.name: Two Wheeler Loan
two-wheeler.description: Affordable financing for your two-wheeler purchase with quick processing and attractive interest rates.

healthcare.name: Healthcare Loan
healthcare.description: Emergency and planned medical treatment financing with flexible repayment options and quick disbursal.

digital.name: Digital Loan
digital.description: Instant digital loans based on your digital footprint and transaction history with completely online processing.
